name: titi-invita
description: Sistema completo de control de mesas para eventos

scripts.db:check: node -e "const { Pool } = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({ host: process.env.DB_HOST, port: process.env.DB_PORT, database: process.env.DB_NAME, user: process.env.DB_USER, password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD, ssl: { rejectUnauthorized: false } }); pool.query('SELECT version()').then(res => { console.log('✅ PostgreSQL:', res.rows[0].version); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Error:', err.message); }).finally(() => pool.end());"

author: Titi Invita Team
